channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Universal Announces 4K Blu-Ray Ultimate Collector’s Editions Of ‘Scarface’ And [Checks Notes] ‘Five Nights At Freddy’s’
item.description: The quality of the films might not exactly be the same, but Universal’s presentation for both these new releases is equally high.

item.title: Trump’s Gutting Of The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau Is Leaving The Public Vulnerable To Abuses
item.description: A massive dismantling of the financial regulator created to protect consumers is underway, affecting everything from auto lending and digital payments...

item.title: How New Research Is Changing What We Know About The Great Hammerhead
item.description: The great hammerhead (Sphyrna mokarran) — one of the ocean’s most iconic predators — is in deeper peril than once thought. Once believed to roam vast ...

item.title: Bang & Olufsen Launches Reloved To Give A Second Life To Its Classic Danish Audio Products
item.description: The luxury audio brand from Denmark is celebrating its centenary and has announced the launch of a dedicated website selling refurbished B&O classic p...

item.title: Your Tree On Battersea: Apple Opens iPad Drawing Competition
item.description: Apple’s Christmas Tree event at Battersea Power Station, this year will be a U.K.-wide competition inviting trees drawn on iPad.

item.title: “I’ve got your back”

item.title: Living in ghost cities

item.title: The other kind of magic

item.title: A little ahead (vs. a little behind)
